```{r read}
base_df <- read.csv("data_with_topics_pred_changed.csv")

for (i in 1:50) {
  filename <- paste0("data_with_stay_", i, ".csv")
  stay_df <- read.csv(filename)
  stay_col <- paste0("stay_", i)
  base_df <- cbind(base_df, stay_df[[stay_col]])
  colnames(base_df)[ncol(base_df)] <- stay_col
}

write.csv(base_df, "data_with_stay.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
